subject: Unable to reference a Semantics Repository
msgSnippet: I am trying to write some junit tests to test some Drools processing.  When I set up my rulebase using a classloader during regular process the load works
messageBody:
I am trying to write some junit tests to test some Drools
processing. When I set up my rulebase using a "classloader" during
regular process the load works fine but when I load it from a junit
test I'm getting "Unable to reference a Semantics Repository." Using
the same class in both instances. Any ideas what is going on?

Thanks!
